data.title: Széchényi
data.text:
Sigmund Gf Széchényi v.Sárvár-Felsövidék (21 Dec 1720-19 Oct 1769); m.25 Jun 1747 Maria Anna Gfn Cziráky de Czirák et Dnesfalva (1 Sep 1724-7 Nov 1787)

1a) Maria Theresa (9 Oct 1749-Gneixendorf21 Nov 1796 [per death register]); m.8 Apr 1774 Franz Gf von Kuefstein (21 Jan 1754-Grünau9 Sep 1800)

2a) Joseph (4 Dec 1751-20 Nov 1775); m.1772 Juliane Gfn Festetics v.Tolna (30 Oct 1753-20 Jan 1824), later wife of his brother

3a) Sigmund (1752-1753)

4a) Barbara (2 Mar 1753-6 Nov 1817); m.1st 1772 Johann Gf Forgach (1724-1774); m.2nd 1777 Franz Gf Des Fours Walderode (1738-20 Nov 1810)

5a) Franz de Paula Joseph (Széplak 29 Apr 1754-Vienna 13 Dec 1820 [per SD: 20 Dec 1820, per 1898-1908 GGT]); m.17 Aug 1777 [27 Aug 1777, per 1898-1908 GGT] his brother’s widow Juliane Gfn Festetics v.Tolna (30 Oct 1753-Vienna20 Jan 1824)

1b) Georg (b.and d.1778)

2b) Ludwig Maria Aloys (Horpács 6 Nov 1781-Vienna 6 Feb 1855 [per SD and 1856-1922 GGT and 1856 Nekrolog; not 7 Feb]); m.1st Prague 16 May 1801 [per SD and 1837-1922 GGT; not 4 May] Aloysia Emanuela Maria Josepha Antonia Theresia Christina Johanna Nepomucena Gfn von Clam u.Gallas (Prague 9 Jul 1781-Sopronhorpács 19 Jul 1822); m.2nd Vienna 18 Mar 1824 Franziska Sydonia Christiana Gfn von Wurmbrand-Stuppach (Vienna 2 Jan 1797-Vienna 7 May 1873)

1c) Johann Nepomuck (3 Jun 1802-24 Feb 1874); m.30 Oct 1825 Agatha Josepha Maria Regina Gobertina Gfin Erdődy de Monyorókerék et Monoszló (7 Apr 1808-Graz22 Mar 1882)

1d) Maria Ladislaus (László) Ludwig Georg Dagobert Johann Nepomuk Franz de Paula (Vienna 14 Sep 1826-Baden bei Wien 28 Feb 1887 [per SD: not 1 Mar 1887]); m.1885 Auguszta Haas

2d) Maria Georg (György) Ludwig Johann Nepomuk Gobert (Vienna 14 Mar 1828-Baden bei Wien 13 Jun 1897); m.30 Apr 1864 (div 1872) Johanna Schwarz (1826- )

3d) Maria Agatha Franzisca Ludovica Stephania (Vienna 18 Oct 1833 [per 1884-1922 GGT; 17 Oct 1833, per 1836-74 GGT]-Goldegg 20 Nov 1920); m.Horpács 14 Oct 1855 August Johann Evangelist Karl Borromäus Joseph Gf Breunner-Enkevoirth, Gf v. Asparn, Edler Herr auf Staatz, Frhr zu Stübing, Fladnitz u. Rabentstein (Grafenegg 1 Oct 1828-Fiume 21 Feb 1894)

4d) Ernestine (Vienna 25 Apr 1836 [per 1837 et seq GGT]-Bárcza 12 Aug 1910); m.Ödenburg 15 Dec 1857 (div) László Gf Zichy de Zich et Vásonykeö (Ofen 11 Sep 1830-Garden Grove, Iowa 11 Feb 1896)

5d) Alexander (Sándor) (Vienna 27 Oct 1837-Vienna 17 Feb 1913 [per SD and 1917-22 GGT; not 17 Apr 1913]); m.Tevel 22 Jan 1866 Natalie Döry de Jobaháza (Tevel 14 Apr 1846-Budapest 6 Jan 1928)

1e) Bartholomäus (Bertalan) Maria Johann Ladislaus Alexander Gobert (Ödenburg 24 Oct 1866-Budapest 4 Jun 1943); m.Budapest 21 Dec 1907 Natalie Gfn Andrássy de Csik-Szent-Király et Kraszna-Horka (Parnó 16 Jan 1864-Budapest 6 Apr 1951); 1917 GGT says they m.11 Oct 1911

1f) Martin (Márton) (Segesd 17 Sep 1909-Graz 16 Feb 1987); m.1st Budapest27 Feb 1935 (div 1949) Judith Gfn Széchényi (1915- ); m.2nd Graz8 Mar 1951 (div 1959) Isabella Voller (Vienna 4 Jan 1927-20 Nov 2008)

1g) Agathe Maria Gobertina Alexandra Nathalie Josephine (b.Budapest 5 Feb 1936); m.Franz Hermann Ballhausen (d.15 Nov 1968)

2g) Bertalan Alexander Rudolf Maria Gobert (Budapest 22 May 1937-Phoenix 20 Aug 2015); m.Mildenhall, UK13 Aug 1962 (div 1977) Ramona Stauner (b.Madison, Wisconsin29 Nov 1936) --> issue

3g) Alexandra (b.Budapest 27 Feb 1940); m.Reno, Nevada18 Aug 1957 (div 1965) Nicholas Vuicich (Fresno 5 Dec 1930-3 Oct 2003)

4g) Dominik Márton Alexander Bertalan Rudolf Maria Gobert (b.Budapest 8 Aug 1944); m.in USA, Norene Eberius (b.Eugene, Oregon24 Aug 1946)

3h) Keith Dominik (b.Everett 1972)

Sztáray de Sztára et Nagy-Mihály-Szirmay de Szirma-Bessenyö, Csernek et Tarkö (Tarna 12 Jan 1843-Budapest 31 Dec 1914 [per 1917-22 GGT; or 30 Dec 1914?])
